clear_search_history_confirmation: Do you really want to clear your search history?
save_search_history_confirmation: This action will save (or overwrite!) current sear history in your device storage.
overwrite_search_history_confirmation: This will overwrite your current search history with previously saved one.
leave_game_description: Are you sure you want to leave the game? You will lose points!
guideline_basic_search: Select your all letters from grid by tapping them. Then use blue search button to see all possible words from given letters. Results are sorted by word length and points value.
guideline_deselect_letters: You can deselect specific letters by tapping them or clear all selected letters by tapping red clear button.
guideline_possible_words_details: By long press on any word from results you can see word details including points value and definitions from sjp dictionary.
guideline_letters_position: You can also use long press on any selected letter to determine its position in word.
guideline_soap_letters: Search engine supports soap letters which can be used as placeholder for any letter. You can also configure your soap letter by long press on it and selecting any letters.
guideline_search_history: From green button you can access your search history. Tap any element from history to see results.
alert_letters_slider_description: Searching words with more than 10 letters may take a while. Be patient.
new_version_description_ios: Version {{version}} of wyrazowo is available to download on TestFlight
new_version_description_android: Version {{version}} of wyrazowo is available to download on App Distribution
change_language_description: To change language you need to restart app
